scripts.docker:up:build: docker compose up -d --build && docker image prune -f
scripts.docker:build: docker compose build && docker image prune -f
scripts.prisma:studio: docker compose exec backend npx prisma studio
scripts.prisma:migrate: docker compose exec backend npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:generate: docker compose exec backend npx prisma generate
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: docker compose exec backend npm test
scripts.test:frontend: docker compose exec frontend npm test
scripts.test:watch:backend: docker compose exec backend npm run test:watch
scripts.test:watch:frontend: docker compose exec frontend npm run test:watch
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.test:coverage:backend: docker compose exec backend npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:coverage:frontend: docker compose exec frontend npm run test:coverage
